content: Multitool grout blade Carbide grout removal blade for the oscillating multitool, for cutting grout and mortar ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Multi-tool inserts- ### FEATURES:Features Increased versatility – quickly swap out grout blade attachments to cover a wide range of base materials and applications More sustainable - adapt the Hilti SMT-6 multitool for different applications and base materials by switching inserts, without stocking multiple tools More flexibility – Starlock interface is compatible with all Starlock multitools on the market Easier to change inserts - Starlock compatible interface for a safer and more convenient tool-free insert change Applications Carbide segmented blade for mortar and grout removal Expand the range of applications possible with the Hilti multitool ### TECHNICAL DATA: Additional Accessory Information: Starlock Carbide mortar and grouth half-moon saw blade, recommended for porous concrete, soft bricks, fibre glass, epoxy, and grout/mortar. 3 3/8 diameter. Technical Data | Additional Accessory Information | Starlock Carbide mortar and grouth half-moon saw blade, recommended for porous concrete, soft bricks, fibre glass, epoxy, and grout/mortar. 3 3/8 diameter. ### ITEMS- 2368509 - Blade SMT Saw carbide tipp. - Package Size 1 pc
